00468 static inline void rtdm_context_lock(struct rtdm_dev_context *context)
00469 {
00470     atomic_inc(&context->close_lock_count);
00471 }
00472 
00473 static inline void rtdm_context_unlock(struct rtdm_dev_context *context)
00474 {
00475     atomic_dec(&context->close_lock_count);
00476 }

00481 {
00482     return xnpod_ticks2ns(xnpod_get_time());

00486 /* --- spin lock services --- */
00529 #define RTDM_EXECUTE_ATOMICALLY(code_block)                                 \
00530 {                                                                           \
00531     spl_t   s;                                                              \
00532                                                                             \
00533     xnlock_get_irqsave(&nklock, s);                                         \
00534     code_block;                                                             \
00535     xnlock_put_irqrestore(&nklock, s);                                      \
00536 }
00537 
00547 #define RTDM_LOCK_UNLOCKED          SPIN_LOCK_UNLOCKED

00553 typedef unsigned long               rtdm_lockctx_t;

00570 #define rtdm_lock_init(lock)        spin_lock_init(lock)
00571 
00588 #define rtdm_lock_get(lock)         rthal_spin_lock(lock)
00589 
00606 #define rtdm_lock_put(lock)         rthal_spin_unlock(lock)
00607 
00625 #define rtdm_lock_get_irqsave(lock, context)    \
00626     rthal_spin_lock_irqsave(lock, context)
00627 
00645 #define rtdm_lock_put_irqrestore(lock, context) \
00646     rthal_spin_unlock_irqrestore(lock, context)
00647 
00664 #define rtdm_lock_irqsave(context)              \
00665     rthal_local_irq_save(context)
00666 
00683 #define rtdm_lock_irqrestore(context)           \
00684     rthal_local_irq_restore(context)

00736 #define rtdm_irq_get_arg(irq_handle, type)  ((type *)irq_handle->cookie)

00739 static inline int rtdm_irq_request(rtdm_irq_t *irq_handle,
00740                                    unsigned int irq_no,
00741                                    rtdm_irq_handler_t handler,
00742                                    unsigned long flags,
00743                                    const char *device_name,
00744                                    void *arg)
00745 {
00746     xnintr_init(irq_handle, irq_no, handler, NULL, flags);
00747     return xnintr_attach(irq_handle, arg);
00748 }
00749 
00750 static inline int rtdm_irq_free(rtdm_irq_t *irq_handle)
00751 {
00752     return xnintr_detach(irq_handle);
00753 }
00754 
00755 static inline int rtdm_irq_enable(rtdm_irq_t *irq_handle)
00756 {
00757     return xnintr_enable(irq_handle);
00758 }
00759 
00760 static inline int rtdm_irq_disable(rtdm_irq_t *irq_handle)
00761 {
00762     return xnintr_disable(irq_handle);
00763 }

00766 /* --- non-real-time signalling services --- */
00767 
00773 typedef unsigned                    rtdm_nrtsig_t;
00774 
00784 typedef void (*rtdm_nrtsig_handler_t)(rtdm_nrtsig_t nrt_sig);
00788 static inline int rtdm_nrtsig_init(rtdm_nrtsig_t *nrt_sig,
00789                                    rtdm_nrtsig_handler_t handler)
00790 {
00791     *nrt_sig = rthal_alloc_virq();
00792 
00793     if (*nrt_sig == 0)
00794         return -EAGAIN;
00795 
00796     rthal_virtualize_irq(rthal_root_domain, *nrt_sig, handler, NULL,
00797                          IPIPE_HANDLE_MASK);
00798     return 0;
00799 }
00800 
00801 static inline void rtdm_nrtsig_destroy(rtdm_nrtsig_t *nrt_sig)
00802 {
00803     rthal_free_virq(*nrt_sig);
00804 }
00805 
00806 static inline void rtdm_nrtsig_pend(rtdm_nrtsig_t *nrt_sig)
00807 {
00808     rthal_trigger_irq(*nrt_sig);
00809 }

00847                    rtdm_task_proc_t task_proc, void *arg,
00848                    int priority, uint64_t period);

00850 static inline void rtdm_task_destroy(rtdm_task_t *task)
00851 {
00852     xnpod_delete_thread(task);
00853 }
00854 
00855 void rtdm_task_join_nrt(rtdm_task_t *task, unsigned int poll_delay);

00857 static inline void rtdm_task_set_priority(rtdm_task_t *task, int priority)
00858 {
00859     xnpod_renice_thread(task, priority);
00860     xnpod_schedule();
00861 }
00862 
00863 static inline int rtdm_task_set_period(rtdm_task_t *task, uint64_t period)
00864 {
00865     return xnpod_set_thread_periodic(task, XN_INFINITE,
00866                                      xnpod_ns2ticks(period));
00867 }
00868 
00869 static inline int rtdm_task_unblock(rtdm_task_t *task)
00870 {
00871     int res = xnpod_unblock_thread(task);
00872 
00873     xnpod_schedule();
00874     return res;
00875 }
00876 
00877 static inline rtdm_task_t *rtdm_task_current(void)
00878 {
00879     return xnpod_current_thread();
00880 }
00881 
00882 static inline int rtdm_task_wait_period(void)
00883 {
00884     return xnpod_wait_thread_period();
00885 }

00892 /* --- timeout sequences */
00893 
00894 typedef uint64_t                    rtdm_toseq_t;
00895 
00896 static inline void rtdm_toseq_init(rtdm_toseq_t *timeout_seq, int64_t timeout)
00897 {
00898     *timeout_seq = xnpod_get_time() + xnpod_ns2ticks(timeout);
00899 }

00902 /* --- event services --- */
00903 
00904 typedef struct {
00905     unsigned long                   pending;
00906     xnsynch_t                       synch_base;
00907 } rtdm_event_t;
00908 
00909 static inline void rtdm_event_init(rtdm_event_t *event, unsigned long pending)
00910 {
00911     event->pending = pending;
00912     xnsynch_init(&event->synch_base, XNSYNCH_PRIO);
00913 }
00914 
00915 void _rtdm_synch_flush(xnsynch_t *synch, unsigned long reason);
00916 
00917 static inline void rtdm_event_destroy(rtdm_event_t *event)
00918 {
00919     _rtdm_synch_flush(&event->synch_base, XNRMID);
00920 }
00921 
00922 int rtdm_event_wait(rtdm_event_t *event);
00923 int rtdm_event_timedwait(rtdm_event_t *event, int64_t timeout,
00924                          rtdm_toseq_t *timeout_seq);
00925 void rtdm_event_signal(rtdm_event_t *event);
00926 
00927 static inline void rtdm_event_pulse(rtdm_event_t *event)
00928 {
00929     _rtdm_synch_flush(&event->synch_base, 0);
00930 }
00931 
00932 static inline void rtdm_event_clear(rtdm_event_t *event)
00933 {
00934     event->pending = 0;
00935 }

00952 {

00962 /* --- mutex services --- */
00963 
00964 typedef struct {
00965     unsigned long                   locked;
00966     xnsynch_t                       synch_base;
00967 } rtdm_mutex_t;
00968 
00969 static inline void rtdm_mutex_init(rtdm_mutex_t *mutex)
00970 {
00971     mutex->locked = 0;
00972     xnsynch_init(&mutex->synch_base, XNSYNCH_PRIO|XNSYNCH_PIP);
00973 }
00974 
00975 static inline void rtdm_mutex_destroy(rtdm_mutex_t *mutex)
00976 {
00977     _rtdm_synch_flush(&mutex->synch_base, XNRMID);
00978 }
00979 
00980 int rtdm_mutex_lock(rtdm_mutex_t *mutex);

00982                          rtdm_toseq_t *timeout_seq);
00983 void rtdm_mutex_unlock(rtdm_mutex_t *mutex);

01000 static inline int rtdm_read_user_ok(rtdm_user_info_t *user_info,
01001                                     const void __user *ptr, size_t size)
01002 {
01003     return __xn_access_ok(user_info, VERIFY_READ, ptr, size);
01004 }
01005 
01006 static inline int rtdm_rw_user_ok(rtdm_user_info_t *user_info,
01007                                   const void __user *ptr, size_t size)
01008 {
01009     return __xn_access_ok(user_info, VERIFY_WRITE, ptr, size);
01010 }
01011 
01012 static inline int rtdm_copy_from_user(rtdm_user_info_t *user_info,
01013                                       void *dst, const void __user *src,
01014                                       size_t size)
01015 {
01016     return __xn_copy_from_user(user_info, dst, src, size);
01017 }
01018 
01019 static inline int rtdm_copy_to_user(rtdm_user_info_t *user_info,
01020                                     void __user *dst, const void *src,
01021                                     size_t size)
01022 {
01023     return __xn_copy_to_user(user_info, dst, src, size);
01024 }
01025 
01026 static inline int rtdm_strncpy_from_user(rtdm_user_info_t *user_info,
01027                                          char *dst,
01028                                          const char __user *src,
01029                                          size_t count)
01030 {
01031     if (unlikely(__xn_access_ok(user_info, VERIFY_READ, src, 1)))
01032         return -EFAULT;
01033     return __xn_strncpy_from_user(user_info, dst, src, count);
01034 }
01035 
01036 static inline int rtdm_in_rt_context(void)
01037 {
01038     return (rthal_current_domain != rthal_root_domain);
01039 }

01042                     rtdm_user_info_t *user_info, void *arg,
01043                     rtdm_rt_handler_t handler);
